---
title: "Publishing"
---

## HTML output strategies

### Single-file (portable)
Set:

```yaml
format:
  html:
    embed-resources: true
```

This produces a standalone HTML file with embedded assets.

### Multi-file (lighter weight)
Set:

```yaml
format:
  html:
    embed-resources: false
```

This produces an HTML file plus a `_files/` folder.

## Sharing options

- Email the standalone HTML output (`embed-resources: true`)
- Publish the documentation site (`docs/_site/`) via:
  - GitHub Pages
  - Internal web server
  - Static hosting (S3/GCS/Azure)

## Reproducibility

- Prefer `freeze: auto` in `_quarto.yml` for stable builds.
- Commit the `.qmd` sources and any scripts/data inputs (or document where they live).
